nodes.text: Star Wars: Battle for Hoth is a tower-defense mobile game developed by FluffyLogic and published by THQ Wireless for the Apple iPhone and iPod Touch. It was released on July 7, 2010. It was available on the Apple App Store for $2.99 USD.
THQ's license for Star Wars app games appears to have expired and the game was removed from listings at the end of August 2011. Star Wars: Cantina was also removed at the same time.
